thread.section_title: GreenZone Bikes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GreenZone Bikes | greenzonebikes.com
thread.title: Barbra Talley
thread.title_full: GreenZone Bikes reviewed by Barbra Talley

author: Barbra Talley
title: Barbra Talley
text:
I purchased my greenzone bike about 3 years and it's still going strong! Living in NY I needed something convenient and easily transportable. It fits perfectly in my truck and leaves more than enough room for groceries. No need for an external bike rack to scratch up the car.
It was a fantastic purchase...no regrets.
